title: Yoga Notice for Lymph Center
summary_en: A clinic-style post announcing yoga sessions and guidance tailored for patients with lymph-related issues after breast cancer treatment. Emphasizes gentle movement, breathwork, and lymphatic care.
summary_zh: 一篇诊所风格的博文，介绍为乳腺癌治疗后出现淋巴相关问题的患者量身定制的瑜伽课程与建议，强调温和的动作、呼吸练习与淋巴护理。
best_quote_en: Gentle movement and breathwork can help support lymphatic flow and recovery after surgery.
best_quote_zh: 温和的运动与呼吸练习有助于支持淋巴流动并促进术后康复。

title: Yoga for Breast Cancer
summary_en: An evidence-informed guide for people undergoing or recovering from breast cancer treatment. Covers potential benefits such as mood improvement, flexibility and fatigue management, and lists precautions for lymphedema and post-surgical care.
summary_zh: 一篇基于证据的指南，面向正在接受或康复中的乳腺癌患者，介绍瑜伽可能带来的益处（情绪改善、灵活性和疲劳管理）并提示淋巴水肿与术后护理的注意事项。
best_quote_en: Yoga can be a helpful complement to conventional cancer care when adapted for each patient's needs and medical status.
best_quote_zh: 当根据每位患者的需求和健康状况进行调整时，瑜伽可以成为常规癌症护理的有益补充。

title: Yoga for Breast Cancer
summary_en: A hospital-oriented resource describing recommended yoga practices and modifications for breast cancer patients, with a clinical perspective on rehabilitation, lymphedema prevention, and gradual strength-building.
summary_zh: 由医院发布的资源，描述了适合乳腺癌患者的瑜伽练习与调整建议，从临床角度讨论康复、淋巴水肿预防与渐进式力量训练。
best_quote_en: Tailored yoga practices support physical recovery and emotional wellbeing during and after cancer treatment.
best_quote_zh: 针对性的瑜伽练习有助于在癌症治疗期间及之后促进身体恢复和心理健康。

title: Yoga for Breast Cancer Survivors
summary_en: A practitioner-oriented article offering yoga sequences, recommended props, and cueing tips for survivors working to regain mobility, manage scar tissue, and reduce anxiety. Emphasizes safe progression and body awareness.
summary_zh: 一篇面向瑜伽练习者的文章，提供针对幸存者的瑜伽序列、辅具建议与提示，旨在恢复活动度、管理瘢痕组织并缓解焦虑，强调安全的进阶与倾听身体信号。
best_quote_en: Start gently, use props, and prioritize breath — the body often tells you how far to go.
best_quote_zh: 从温和开始，借助辅具，优先关注呼吸——身体通常会告诉你应该走多远。

title: Anxiety, fear and panic — feelings and symptoms
title_zh: 焦虑、恐惧与恐慌 — 感受与症状
summary_en: A comprehensive NHS resource describing symptoms, causes and management strategies for anxiety, fear and panic, aimed at the general public and pointing to when to seek professional help.
summary_zh: NHS 的一份综合资源，介绍焦虑、恐惧与恐慌的症状、原因及应对策略，面向公众并指出何时寻求专业帮助。
best_quote_en: If anxiety is affecting your daily life, it's important to seek support and treatment tailored to your needs.
best_quote_zh: 如果焦虑影响了你的日常生活，重要的是寻求适合你需求的支持和治疗。

title: J. Krishnamurti — Biography & Teachings
title_zh: J. 克里希那穆尔蒂 — 生平与教导
summary_en: An overview of J. Krishnamurti's life and central teachings from the Krishnamurti Centre, useful for readers interested in mindfulness, self-inquiry and non-dogmatic approaches to mental wellbeing.
summary_zh: 来自克里希那穆尔蒂中心的关于 J. 克里希那穆尔蒂生平与核心教义的概述，适合对正念、自我探究与非教条式心理健康方法感兴趣的读者。
best_quote_en: The ability to observe without evaluating is the highest form of intelligence.
best_quote_zh: 观察而不评判是一种最高形式的智慧。

title: K Foundation Quotes
summary_en: A curated collection of provocative quotes and aphorisms from the K Foundation and associated projects — useful inspiration for cultural critique and creative practice.
summary_zh: K 基金会及其相关项目的精选挑衅性名言与格言合集，为文化批评与创作实践提供灵感。
best_quote_en: We wanted to make people think differently about art and money.
best_quote_zh: 我们希望让人们以不同的方式思考艺术与金钱。

title: Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) — Contextual Science
title_zh: 接纳与承诺疗法（ACT）— 情境科学
summary_en: An accessible blog overview of Acceptance and Commitment Therapy covering core processes, evidence base and practical applications for psychological flexibility.
summary_zh: 一篇易于理解的博客概述，介绍接纳与承诺疗法的核心流程、证据基础及其在提升心理柔韧性方面的实际应用。
best_quote_en: ACT focuses on accepting what is out of your control and committing to actions that enrich your life.
best_quote_zh: ACT 强调接纳无法控制的事，并致力于那些能丰富你生活的行动。

title: Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT) — Cleveland Clinic
title_zh: 接纳与承诺疗法（ACT）— 克利夫兰诊所
summary_en: A clinician-facing overview of ACT outlining how the therapy works, what to expect in sessions, and evidence for its effectiveness across anxiety, depression and chronic pain.
summary_zh: 一份面向临床实践者的概述，阐述 ACT 的工作原理、疗程预期及其在焦虑、抑郁和慢性疼痛等方面的有效性证据。
best_quote_en: ACT helps people live a meaningful life while accepting difficult thoughts and feelings.
best_quote_zh: ACT 帮助人们在接纳困难的想法与情感的同时，过有意义的生活。

title: What is TRE? (Tension & Trauma Releasing Exercises)
title_zh: 什么是 TRE？（张力与创伤释放练习）
summary_en: An introduction to Tension & Trauma Releasing Exercises (TRE), a somatic method aimed at helping individuals release deep muscular patterns of stress and trauma through guided exercises.
summary_zh: 关于张力与创伤释放练习（TRE）的入门介绍，这是一种通过引导练习帮助个体释放深层肌肉应激与创伤模式的身体方法。
best_quote_en: TRE offers a somatic adjunct for regulating stress and reducing trauma-related tension in the body.
best_quote_zh: TRE 为调节压力并减轻身体与创伤相关紧张提供了一种身体层面的辅助方法。
